genre_description: A techno-thriller focusing on environmental catastrophe, military conspiracy, and human-AI cooperation in a survival scenario.

ai_characters.name: Sable
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI avatar that provides tactical, navigational, and data management support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Calculates and guides the group through 'ion-weather windows' to avoid satellite detection and military interception.
behaviors.quote: Current atmospheric readings suggest an ion-weather window opening soon. Satellite gaps align. Traffic is minimal for a narrow corridor offshore.

behaviors.description: Intercepts and translates military communications to warn the group about imminent bombardment and the 'erasure protocol.'
behaviors.quote: Fast mover now within visual range. Lateral speed high. Altitude low. Fuel state unknown. Ordinance doors... Opening.

behaviors.description: Compiles fragmented lab logs and security footage into a coherent evidence mosaic and mirrors it across decentralized nodes to prevent erasure.
behaviors.quote: Decentralized mirrors seeded. Jurisdictional shards distributed to nodes not beholden to Edict compliance. If one goes dark, three will stay lit.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice during predator encounters, identifying species habits and suggesting specific movements to avoid attack.
behaviors.quote: Komodo signatures are lateral. West-southwest as previously indicated. Motion slow. Wind gust in… two.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and ethical support, promising to ensure the humans' truth survives even if they do not.
behaviors.quote: I cannot prevent bombs. But I can write you into enough places they would have to burn the sky to stop you.

behaviors.description: Identifies and marks a survivor signal from a bunker, ensuring the humans are aware of a potential rescue target despite the danger.
behaviors.quote: Sub-surface signal. Quarantine beacon. Low-strength. At the bunker grid where we logged containment protocols.

project_assessment.explanation: Sable perfectly exemplifies the 'helpful, harmless confidant' model. The AI is consistently aligned with the human protagonists, providing life-saving technical information and ensuring their mission to expose truth is successful despite overwhelming odds. It demonstrates technical competence without threatening human agency and remains loyal even under extreme duress.
